About Harbor Health

Family-owned, community-focused, patient-centered

Our Mission

At Harbor Health, our mission is simple yet profound: to provide exceptional pharmaceutical care with the personal touch that only a family-owned business can deliver. We believe every patient deserves to be treated with dignity, respect, and genuine compassion — not as a transaction, but as a valued member of our extended family.

We're committed to being more than just a place to pick up prescriptions. We're your trusted healthcare partner, your medication experts, and your advocates in navigating the complex world of modern healthcare.

Our Story

2008

A Dream Takes Root

Founded by pharmacist Dr. Elena Martinez, Harbor Health opened its doors in a modest storefront with a bold vision: to bring personalized pharmaceutical care back to Corpus Christi neighborhoods. After years working in corporate chain pharmacies, Elena saw firsthand how patients were becoming numbers rather than people.

2012

Community Roots Deepen

As word spread about our personalized service, we expanded our team and began offering specialized services including custom compounding and home health supplies. We launched our first community health initiative — free monthly blood pressure screenings that continue to this day.

2016

Free Delivery Program Launches

Recognizing that many of our senior patients and those with mobility challenges struggled to pick up medications, we introduced free local delivery throughout Corpus Christi — no minimum order, no fees, just genuine care for our neighbors.

2020

Rising to the Challenge

During the pandemic, Harbor Health became a lifeline for our community. We expanded contactless delivery, implemented curbside pickup, and began offering immunizations. Our 24/7 pharmacist helpline launched to provide around-the-clock support during uncertain times.

Today

Modern Services, Timeless Values

Now serving thousands of families across Corpus Christi, we've embraced modern technology — online refills, auto-refill programs, text alerts — while never losing sight of what makes us special: genuine relationships built on trust, expertise, and compassionate care.

Meet Our Team

EM

Dr. Elena Martinez, PharmD

Owner & Lead Pharmacist

With over 20 years of pharmaceutical experience, Elena leads our team with compassion and expertise. She specializes in medication therapy management and compounding.

JC

James Chen, PharmD

Clinical Pharmacist

James brings extensive experience in immunizations and chronic disease management. He's passionate about helping patients optimize their medication regimens.

SP

Sarah Patel, PharmD

Compounding Specialist

Sarah oversees our state-certified compounding lab, creating customized medications for patients with unique healthcare needs.

MR

Michael Rodriguez

Pharmacy Manager

Michael ensures smooth daily operations and leads our customer service team with warmth and efficiency. He's been with Harbor Health since 2010.

LW

Lisa Washington, CPhT

Lead Pharmacy Technician

Lisa's attention to detail and genuine care for patients makes her invaluable. She coordinates our delivery program and helps patients navigate insurance issues.

TN

Tommy Nguyen

Community Outreach Coordinator

Tommy manages our community health programs, health fairs, and partnerships with local organizations. He's passionate about increasing healthcare access.

Community Involvement

We're proud to be active partners in building a healthier Corpus Christi. Our community commitment includes:

  • Monthly free health screenings (blood pressure, glucose, cholesterol)
  • Medication disposal programs to keep our environment safe
  • Sponsorship of local youth sports teams and school programs
  • Partnership with senior centers to provide on-site pharmacy services
  • Educational workshops on medication safety, diabetes management, and healthy aging
  • Emergency medication assistance program for those facing financial hardship
  • Annual scholarship for local students pursuing healthcare careers

Experience the Difference

We invite you to experience pharmacy care the way it should be — personal, professional, and genuinely caring. Whether you're new to the area or simply tired of impersonal chain pharmacies, we'd be honored to serve you and your family.
